constituent: history, mouth, tucked under the arm
heisigStory: A mouth . . . tucked under the arm.
koohiiStory1: I sleep in history class with my mouth tucked under my arm.
koohiiStory2: History students usually going to school with a history book tucked under their arm. But now instead of a book, you have a small talking mouth that tell you about history. "When I was young, I used to walk 5 miles everyday.....".
myStory: lịch sử. miệng dưới cánh tay
